tit.e: Cultural Park Joyo(文化パルク城陽)
Cultural Park Joyo(文化パルク城陽)
Cultural Park Joyo (文化パルク城陽)
tit.cmt: カッコを半角に変更、スペースを追加

sen.j: 文化パルク城陽（ぶんかパルク じょうよう）は、京都府城陽市にある複合文化施設。
sen.e: Cultural Park Joyo is a composite cultural facility located in Joyo City of Kyoto Prefecture.
Cultural Park Joyo is a composite cultural facility located in Joyo City in Kyoto Prefecture.
Cultural Park Joyo is a composite cultural facility located in Joyo City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: Joyo Cityの後の"in"をカンマに変更

sen.j: 大小ホールのほかに、プラネタリウム、歴史民族資料館、図書館、コミュニティセンターなどを併せ持つ。
sen.e: It houses large and small halls, a planetarium, a folk heritage museum, a library, and a community center.
It houses large and small halls, a planetarium, a folk heritage museum, a library, and a community center.
It houses large and small halls, a planetarium, a folk heritage museum, a library, and a community center.

sen.j: ホールに関しては宇治市文化センター・八幡市文化センターと比較的近距離に位置し、少なからず競合状態にある。
sen.e: It is located relatively close to Uji City Culture Center and Yawata City Culture Center competing with each other.
sen.cmt: 八幡市文化センター→Yawata City Culture Center[定訳不明,URL(http://www.yawata-bunka.jp/center/index.htm)]
sen.e: It is located relatively close to Uji City Culture Center and Yawata City Culture Center and competition is fierce.
It is located relatively close to Uji City Culture Center and Yawata City Culture Center and competition is fierce.
Completed in 1995.
Completed in 1995.
Completed in 1995.

sen.j: 設計は西村征一郎。
sen.e: Designed by Seiichiro NISHIMURA.
Designed by Seiichiro NISHIMURA.
Designed by Seiichiro NISHIMURA.

sen.j: 施設概要
sen.e: Summary of the facility
Summary of facilities
Summary of Facilities
sen.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に変更

sen.j: 敷地面積 18,146m2 延床面積 19,968m2
sen.e: Site area: 18,146 m2; total floor space: 19,968 m2
Site area: 18,146 m2; total floor space: 19,968 m2
Site area: 18,146 square meters; total floor space: 19,968 square meters

sen.j: プラムホール（大ホール）
sen.e: Puramu hall (the large hall)
sen.cmt: プラムホール→Puramu hall)[定訳不明]
sen.e: Puramu hall (the large hall)
Puramu hall (the large hall)

sen.j: 1,305席（うち車椅子席12） 3階席まで
sen.e: 1305 seats (including 12 for wheelchairs), up to the third floor balcony seats
1305 seats (including 12 for wheelchairs), up to the third floor balcony seats
1305 seats (including 12 for wheelchairs), up to the third floor balcony seats

sen.j: 音楽練習室、スタジオ、ビデオ編集室を併設。
sen.e: it is equipped with a music practice room, a studio, and a video editing room.
It is equipped with a music practice room, a studio, and a video editing room.
It is equipped with a music practice room, a studio, and a video editing room.

sen.j: ふれあいホール（小ホール）
sen.e: Fureai hall (Community Hall)

sen.e: Fureai hall (Community Hall)
Fureai hall (Community Hall)

sen.j: 標準で324席（うち1階250席は可動）。
sen.e: Usually 324 seats (including movable 250 seats on the ground floor)
Usually 324 seats (including movable 250 seats on the ground floor)
Usually 324 seats (including movable 250 seats on the ground floor)

sen.j: 400席まで追加可能。
sen.e: More seats can be added up to 400 seats.
More seats can be added to take the total up to 400 seats.
More seats can be added to take the total up to 400 seats.

sen.e: Cosmo Hall

Cosmo Hall

sen.j: 252席（うち車椅子席6）
sen.e: 252 seats (including six for wheelchairs)
252 seats (including six for wheelchairs)
252 seats (including six for wheelchairs)

sen.j: ドーム直径23m
sen.e: The diameter of its dome is 23 m.
The diameter of its dome is 23 m.
The diameter of its dome is 23 m.

sen.j: 城陽市歴史民俗資料館
sen.e: Joyo City Folk Heritage Museum
sen.cmt: 城陽市歴史民俗資料館→Joyo City Folk Heritage Museum（城陽市歴史民俗資料館）[定訳不明]

sen.j: 寺田コミュニティセンター
sen.e: Terada Community Center

sen.e: Terada Community Center
Terada Community Center

sen.j: ほかに、図書館、プレイルーム、大小会議室、茶室、チケットぴあ、食事施設など。
sen.e: It also houses a library, a play room, large and small meeting rooms, a tea ceremony room, Ticket PIA (PIA Corporation), and restaurants.
It also houses a library, a play room, large and small meeting rooms, a tea ceremony room, Ticket PIA (PIA Corporation), and restaurants.
It also houses a library, a play room, large and small meeting rooms, a tea ceremony room, Ticket PIA (ticket vendor), and restaurants.
sen.cmt: 「チケットぴあ」の表記を修正

sen.j: 管理運営は財団法人城陽市民余暇活動センター。
sen.e: It is operated by Joyo Civil Leisure Activity Foundation.
It is operated by Joyo Civil Leisure Activity Foundation.
It is operated by Joyo Civil Leisure Activity Foundation.

sen.e: Location
Location
Location

sen.j: 京都府城陽市寺田今堀1
sen.e: Teradaimabori 1, Joyo City, Kyoto Prefecture
Teradaimabori 1, Joyo City, Kyoto Prefecture
1 Terada Imabori, Joyo City, Kyoto Prefecture

sen.j: 近鉄京都線寺田駅から徒歩約10分。
sen.e: Approximately ten minutes on foot from Terada Station of Kintetsu Corporation Kyoto Line
Approximately ten minutes on foot from Terada Station on the Kintetsu Corporation Kyoto Line
Approximately ten minutes on foot from Terada Station on the Kintetsu Corporation Kyoto Line.
